topic.title: How to Add a Copyright Page after the Map Cover (not for Bookmaps)

body.p: The plain DITA maps do not have the concept of a copyright notice. This is available only in the DITA bookmaps structure.
If you are constrained in using a plain map and you need to add a copyright page between the front cover and the TOC use the following technique:
In your customization css declare a new page layout:
The oxy:front-page contains the title of the publication and generates the cover page. We are creating a synthetic element that follows this element and place it on a different page.
